text: Tessari is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Daniele Tessari, Italian motorcycle speedway rider *Duccio Tessari (1926–1994), Italian film director, screenwriter and actor *Girolamo Tessari (c. 1480 – c. 1561), Italian Renaissance painter *Luciano Tessari (born 1928), Italian footballer and manager Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Tessari
